text: that's fair enough! it makes sense. i'd say though, if there's something you feel you aren't as strong at, but enjoy doing more, not to let it fall by the wayside - because at the end of the day, i think any VFX related is a gig has to be partly for the enjoyment of it, to overcome some of the more more universally negative parts of the profession. Tracking is probably an excellent foot in the door plan though, but something a lot of people end up doing as a stepping stone for more compy roles. Did you get to do any work experience anywhere?
